TextEng: I don't recognize you. Have you come to finish what Dergiab started? No... you look more like intruders to me.
Text: 못 보던 얼굴이군. 데지압이 시작한 일을 끝내러 왔나? 아니... 그보단 침입자처럼 보이는데.

TextEng: Ha! Are you thinking that I'll believe you actually came here to rescue me instead of simply stumbling across this cell?
Text: 하! 우연히 이 감방을 발견한 게 아니라 진짜 날 구하러 왔다고 믿을 거라 생각하나?

TextEng: Forgive me if I'm skeptical, but I'll believe I'm rescued when I taste the fresh air of the surface, not before then.
Text: 의심스럽다고 해서 미안하지만, 지상의 신선한 공기를 맛봐야 구출된 걸 믿겠어. 그 전엔 안 돼.

TextEng: No need to make threats. If you have questions, I'll be more than happy to answer them... I assume you're here to fight Dergiab, no?
Text: 위협할 필요 없어. 질문이 있으면 기꺼이 답해 주지... 데지압이랑 싸우러 온 거겠지?

TextEng: Well, yes. That's true. I am a prisoner. Dergiab betrayed me, and threw me in here when I was no longer of use to him.
Text: 그래, 맞아. 난 죄수야. 데지압이 배신해서 쓸모없어지자 날 여기 처넣었거든.

TextEng: I would have assumed the other denizens of these caves would have filled you in on this by now. The 'master' is all they can babble about.
Text: 여기 동굴 거주자들이 이미 얘기해 줬을 줄 알았는데. 그놈들은 '주인님'만 떠들어대거든.

TextEng: Dergiab - or 'the master', if you prefer - is an ogre mage of some power... He was also my former partner until he fell in with that cult and betrayed me.
Text: 데지압-아니면 '주인님'이라 부르든-은 제법 강한 오우거 마법사야... 그 사교에 빠져 날 배신하기 전까진 내 동료였지.

TextEng: You'll let me go just like that? I must warn you, Dergiab is not to be trifled with. I could tell you much that would aid you.
Text: 그냥 보내 줄 거야? 경고하는데, 데지압은 만만치 않아. 도움 될 얘기 많이 해줄 텐데.

TextEng: As I thought! Come at me, then, <race> fool... Let me die fighting!!
Text: 그럴 줄 알았어! 덤벼라, <race> 멍청아... 싸우다 죽자!!

TextEng: I'll be glad to leave all this far, far behind. I thank you for releasing me, my <race> friend. We won't meet again.
Text: 이 모든 걸 멀리, 아주 멀리 떠날 수 있어서 기뻐. 풀어줘서 고마워, <race> 친구. 다시는 안 볼 거야.

TextEng: Is there any other reason for you to be down here? Dergiab still has our small army, after all, and likely lots of treasure.
Text: 여기 내려온 다른 이유라도 있나? 어쨌든 데지압이 아직 우리 소규모 군대를 갖고 있으니까, 보물도 많을 거야.

TextEng: He was. At least he was until he went away and came back with that cultist. Before that, we recruited our army together.
Text: 그랬지. 어디 갔다가 사교도 하나 데리고 올 때까진. 그 전까진 함께 군대를 모았거든.

TextEng: Hmph? For what else? To gain power. We wanted to do the same as Sythsillis down in Amn! Maybe even raid Luskan...
Text: 흥? 뭐 하러 그랬겠어? 힘을 얻으려고. 암 아래 시스실리스처럼 하고 싶었어! 아마 러스칸 습격까지...

TextEng: There aren't many soldiers, yet. I was insistent on picking only the best of the bugbears, orcs and goblins in these caves... and that's slim pickings.
Text: 병사는 아직 많지 않아. 이 동굴에 있는 버그베어, 오크, 고블린 중 최고만 뽑으라고 고집했거든... 고를 게 별로 없었지.

TextEng: I don't know much about it. Dergiab came back from one of his outings with a cultist beside him. He claimed there had been a change of plans.
Text: 잘 모르겠어. 데지압이 외출했다 와선 사교도를 데리고 왔거든. 계획이 바뀌었다고 하더라.

TextEng: Dergiab only listened to the cultist after that. Said he was preparing the army for some different purpose, something greater.
Text: 그 뒤로 데지압은 사교도 말만 들었어. 군대를 다른 목적으로, 뭔가 더 큰 일을 위해 준비한다고 했지.

TextEng: I objected, naturally. Foolishly, as it turns out, seeing as where it got me.
Text: 당연히 반대했지. 어리석었어, 결과적으로. 결국 날 이 꼴로 만들었으니.

TextEng: His name's Ganon. He's an assassin or rogue or somesuch thing. I never spoke to him much, so I couldn't tell you more.
Text: 이름은 가논. 암살자나 도적 비슷한 거야. 별로 얘기 안 나눠서 더 말해 줄 건 없어.

TextEng: No. Dergiab would only say that they needed the forces for the "Return," whatever that means. The cultist wouldn't elaborate, at least, not to me.
Text: 아니. 데지압은 "귀환"을 위해 군대가 필요하다고만 했어. 무슨 뜻인지는 모르겠지만. 사교도는 자세히 말 안 했어, 적어도 나한텐.

TextEng: I'll be here. Heck, I couldn't go anywhere if I wanted to...
Text: 여기 있을게. 아, 가고 싶어도 갈 수가 없는걸...

TextEng: Back again? Have you decided to finish off what Dergiab has started, after all?
Text: 다시 왔나? 결국 데지압이 시작한 일을 끝내기로 한 거야?
